label: Topics in Microeconomics III
description: Studies bounded rationality and learning in economics. Topics include evolutionary learning in models. Prerequisite: MATH 415, ECON 533 and ECON 534 or equivalent.
courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: MATH 415, ECON 533 and ECON 534 or equivalent.
sectionDeptRestriction: Restricted to students in the Economics department.
